title: Video: Azekel – That Feeling
body:
Last week saw the emergence of **Azekel**, the east-London based R&B crooner that had more than a little bit of **Frank Ocean** about him, in a good way however, I assure you.

  The first track the man put out, _That Feeling_, now has a video. It’s a pretty simple, functional video, but if anything it will undoubtedly bring more people to the party. The party happens to be soulful, honest and at times utterly captivating.

Hit play below.
